Reviews.Title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
Reviews.Author: c. massey
Reviews.Content: Laptop is the worst I've ever had; not sure why; it could be the Windows 8.  It will barely connect to the internet and then moves so slowly it is ridiculous.  I know it is the laptop, because I have another one that sails along, as well as my phone and my tablet.  But this one is a darn parking lot.  It is the only laptop with Windows 8 so it could be either the Windows 8 or the laptop; but to me, it doesn't matter which.  I would not recommend this product

Reviews.Title: GREAT product
Reviews.Author: mspete1
Reviews.Content: This is a great laptop and I use it every day.  It is easy to learn and use and can do everything I need including email, internet, graphics and word processing.  It is fast and does not seem to have the glitches I have run into with other computers. You will love it!

ProductInfo.Features:
3rd Gen Intel® Core i5-3317U processor (3MB cache and up to 2.6GHz processor speed with Turbo Boost) /  6GB DDR3 memory (expandable to 16GB) / 750GB Serial ATA hard drive (5400 rpm)
14" LED-backlit TFT-LCD high-definition widescreen touch-screen display (1366x768 (HD), 16:9 aspect ratio, Supports 720p content) / Intel® Wireless Display / Mobile Intel® HD graphics (64-1696MB shared video memory) / Built-in HD webcam with microphone
Multiformat DVD±RW/CD-RW drive with double-layer support / Multiformat media reader / 1-USB (3.0) port, 2-USB (3.0) ports with Sleep and Charge / 6-cell lithium-ion battery
Built-in high-speed wireless LAN (802.11b/g/n) / Built-in 10/100 Ethernet LAN / HDMI Port /     Headphone jack (stereo), Microphone jack (mono), SRS Premium Sound HD, harman/kardon® stereo speakers / Weighs 4.3 lbs. and measures just 1.1" thin
Microsoft Windows 8 64-bit operating system / ENERGY STAR qualified / Etched aluminum body in prestige silver
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba - Satellite 14" Touch-Screen Laptop - 6GB Memory - 750GB Hard Drive - Champagne Silver
